data.text:
@MorganKathCymru @PublicHealthW That's right. I'm murdering people every day I come into contact with someone. FFS

So every interaction with anyone else is when masked? Sitting in the office? Family round the house? Going out to eat or drink? Walking in the street? Sitting in the park? And LFT for visitors?

@Gareth_Jenks23 @PublicHealthW I will still protect others.

I assume you are choosing not to bother.

@thedrawbarkid @Garethjosprey @PublicHealthW Not unlucky but a big school so has been badly affected by covid. I do understand though that fear in some people switches their brains to denial. It's a classic symptom of fear.

@MorganKathCymru @PublicHealthW That's fine. You should exercise your choice. As others should be allowed to

Especially given the news today of the analysis showing that covid has a lower IFR than flu.
@thedrawbarkid @Gladyspew100 @PublicHealthW Bonkers isn’t it. She’s constantly going on about her daughters school as well. It’s the most unluckiest school in the world.

@Gareth_Jenks23 @PublicHealthW No one said anything about protective measures forever - although some, like improved ventilation, should be.

It's not all about hospitalisations, it's long term impacts, long covid, increased risk of diabetes. When prevalence is high, I will carry on but wear a mask.
@thedrawbarkid @Gareth_Jenks23 @MorganKathCymru @PublicHealthW They don’t want to know this detail.
